properties.name: columnDefs

parsedColDefs:
[
    {
        field: 'make',
        cellEditor: 'agSelectCellEditor',
        cellEditorParams: { values: 'AG_LITERAL_carBrands' },
        filterParams: { valueFormatter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupValue(carMappings, params.value);\n}' },
        valueFormatter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupValue(carMappings, params.value);\n}'
    },
    {
        field: 'exteriorColour',
        minWidth: 150,
        cellEditor: 'agRichSelectCellEditor',
        cellEditorPopup: true,
        cellEditorParams: {
            values: 'AG_LITERAL_colours',
            cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer'
        },
        filter: 'agSetColumnFilter',
        filterParams: {
            values: 'AG_LITERAL_colours',
            valueFormatter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupValue(colourMappings, params.value);\n}',
            cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer'
        },
        valueFormatter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupValue(colourMappings, params.value);\n}',
        valueParser: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupKey(colourMappings, params.newValue);\n}',
        cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer'
    },
    {
        field: 'interiorColour',
        minWidth: 150,
        cellEditor: 'agTextCellEditor',
        cellEditorParams: { useFormatter: true },
        filter: 'agSetColumnFilter',
        filterParams: {
            values: 'AG_LITERAL_colours',
            valueFormatter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupValue(colourMappings, params.value);\n}',
            cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer'
        },
        valueFormatter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupValue(colourMappings, params.value);\n}',
        valueParser: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return lookupKey(colourMappings, params.newValue);\n}',
        cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer'
    },
    {
        headerName: 'Retail Price',
        field: 'price',
        minWidth: 140,
        colId: 'retailPrice',
        valueGetter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return params.data.price;\n}',
        valueFormatter: 'AG_LITERAL_currencyFormatter',
        valueSetter: 'AG_LITERAL_numberValueSetter'
    },
    {
        headerName: 'Retail Price (incl Taxes)',
        minWidth: 205,
        editable: false,
        valueGetter: 'AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return params.getValue(\'retailPrice\') * 1.2;\n}',
        valueFormatter: 'AG_LITERAL_currencyFormatter'
    }
]
